description: This json file contains the corrections for the deepJetRun2 AK4 jet taggers for the Run3Summer22-PartialReReco campaign. Working points for the tagging algorithms are also supplied in this file (wp_values).

corrections.name: deepJetRun2_wp_values
corrections.description: Working points values of the b-jet discrimination for deepJetRun2 in Run3Summer22-PartialReReco. The L/M/T/XT/XXT working points correspond to 10/1/0.1/0.05/0.01% light jet-misidentification rates.

output.name: wp
output.description: Working point value of the b-jet discriminator
